# buffer

**Instance Property**

The Metal buffer backing all vertex and index data.

## Declaration

```swift
var buffer: any MTLBuffer { get }
```

## Discussion

Many [doc://com.apple.metalkit/documentation/MetalKit/MTKMeshBuffer] objects may reference the same [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLBuffer] object, in which case each [doc://com.apple.metalkit/documentation/MetalKit/MTKMeshBuffer] object will have its own unique [doc://com.apple.metalkit/documentation/MetalKit/MTKMeshBuffer/offset] value.

## Metal Buffer Properties

- **length**: The logical size of the Metal buffer, in bytes.
- **offset**: The byte offset of the data within the Metal buffer.
